resources.string: Espresso poured on vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.
Espresso with added hot water (100-150 ml). Often served in a cappuccino cup.
Espresso with steamed milk, little foam, served in a latte glass.
Espresso, hot milk, and steamed-milk foam. Often topped with cocoa powder.
Espresso with chocolate syrup, steamed milk, and whipped cream.
